name: Bribables - Story Based RPG
description:
Welcome adventurers!!! Bribables will be released early 2018 (Game is currently in Alpha early access) Bribables is a story about corruption and good. It is a single player, third person style computer game. It is based on true stories and fantasy.
  • An adventure based on real life corrupt politicians and some of the top leaders in our world.
  • Defeat or join King Donald Dump and bribable King ‘Enrique Ñetas´ in their evil plans.
  • Help build or destroy a wall between kingdoms.
  • Stop some leaders from destroying families and deporting our fellow travelers or help them out!!!
  • Story rich game play, based on true stories and fantasy
  • Open world 3D environments (some levels are modeled off real world terrain)
  • Alternate ending based on player’s decisions
  • 55 Story related quests (some unrelated quests and tasks)
  • Comedy

We really need your feedback!!! Please give us some of your time and tell us about any ideas, recommendations, likes and dislikes.

This is the only way that we can make this game better for you all.,,

Bribables is now in Alpha and early access.  This version will be 60% off its final price and we will release updates every 10 to 15 days.  

There is also a FREE DEMO version available at www.indiedb.com/games/bribable... 

  or at www.bribables.com/downloads if you want to try our game first.  The demo version showcases the first chapter of the story and some unrelated quests.  It has a lot of unexplored areas and does not include any of the main characters, like King Donald Dump, who is in the Early Access version.   

If you enjoy our game, please support us to make this game a reality. Stay tuned and subscribe to our newsletter in our website for information about us.
